diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CD$ is $3x-7$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $2x$ units.
The length of the line $ED$ is $14$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $C$.
line_instances: There are lines $BC$, $BD$, $BE$, forming a triangle $BDE$.
There are lines $CD$, $CE$, $ED$, forming a triangle $CDE$.
